questions.question: What keyword declares block-scoped variables?
questions.explanation: let creates variables limited to their block scope.

questions.question: What operator checks strict equality?
questions.explanation: === compares value and type without coercion.

questions.question: What method adds elements to the end of an array?
What method removes the last element from an array?
questions.explanation: pop removes and returns the last element.

questions.question: What loop repeats while a condition is true?
questions.explanation: while loops continue until conditions become false.

questions.question: What function creates delays in code execution?
questions.explanation: setTimeout executes code after a specified delay.

questions.question: What method selects elements using CSS selectors?
questions.explanation: querySelector finds elements matching CSS patterns.

questions.question: What method attaches event handlers to elements?
questions.explanation: addEventListener registers event listeners on elements.
